class.itemDescription: The Misc class contains general purpose functions of common use.

methods.itemDescription:
Allows creation and append of a file within RE ValidLocations.
For OSI/RE this is only the RE directory / sub-directories
For CUO/RE this is only CUO or RE directory / sub-directories
The filename MUST end in a limited file suffix list
Checks to see if an identical line is already in the file, and does not add if it exists

Allows creation and append of a file within RE ValidLocations.
For OSI/RE this is only the RE directory / sub-directories
For CUO/RE this is only CUO or RE directory / sub-directories
The filename MUST end in a limited file suffix list
Play Beep system sound.
Cancel a prompt request.

methods.returnDesc: The path to the saved file.
methods.itemDescription: Creates a snapshot of the current UO window.
Allow the scripted loading of a profile

methods.returnDesc: True: Object is ignored - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Check object from ignore list, return true if present. Can check Serial, Items or Mobiles

methods.returnDesc: True: Shared value exists - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Check if a shared value exixts.
Clear the Drag-n-Drop queue.
Clear ignore list from all object

Close the backpack. 
(OSI client only, no ClassicUO)
Close opened Old Menu.

methods.returnDesc: Full path to the Scripts Directory.
methods.itemDescription: Get the full path to the Config Directory.

paramList.itemDescription: Poition of the option in the menu. Starts from 0.

methods.itemDescription: Respond to a context menu on mobile or item. Menu ID is base zero, or can use string of menu text.

paramList.itemDescription: serial number of the item to get a context menu from
Name of the Entry as wirtten in-game.

methods.returnDesc: Full path to the Config Directory.
methods.itemDescription: Get the full path to the Config Directory.

Allows deletion of a file within RE ValidLocations.
For OSI/RE this is only the RE directory / sub-directories
For CUO/RE this is only CUO or RE directory / sub-directories
The filename MUST end in a limited file suffix list
Force client to disconnect.
Returns the UO distance between the 2 sets of co-ordinates.
Compute the distance between 2 Point3D using pythagorian.

paramList.itemDescription: Name of the output file. (default: Config/AutoComplete.json )

methods.itemDescription: Return a string containing list RE Python API list in JSON format.

paramList.itemDescription:
0: Spring (default fallback)
1: Summer
2: Fall
3: Winter
4: Desolation

methods.itemDescription:
Enable or disable the Seasons filter forcing a specific season
Season filter state will be saved on logout but not the season flag that will be recovered.
Set UoClient window in focus or restore if minimized.

methods.returnDesc: Return X,Y coordinates as a Point2D
methods.itemDescription:
Get the position of the currently active Gump/Container.
(OSI client only, no ClassicUO)

methods.returnDesc: A MapInfo object.
methods.itemDescription: Get MapInfo about a Mobile or Item using the serial

methods.returnDesc: Text of the title.
methods.itemDescription: Get the title of title for open Old Menu.

methods.returnDesc: Rectangle object. Properties: X, Y, Width, Height.
methods.itemDescription:
Get a Rectangle representing the window size.
See also: https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.drawing.rectangle

methods.returnDesc: True: is open - False: otherwise
methods.itemDescription: Check if an Old Menu is open.

methods.returnDesc: True: there is a prompt - False: otherwise
methods.itemDescription: Check if have a prompt request.

methods.returnDesc: True: Has quesy - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Check if a have a query string menu opened, return true or false.
Add an entiry to the ignore list. Can ignore Serial, Items or Mobiles.
Prompt the user with a Target. Open the inspector for the selected target.

methods.returnDesc: Return True - is an Item False - is not an item

paramList.itemDescription: Serial number of object to test is Item

methods.itemDescription: Determine if the serial is an item

methods.returnDesc: Return True - is a mobile False - is not a mobile

paramList.itemDescription: Serial number of object to test is Mobile

methods.itemDescription: Determine if the serial is a mobile
Returns the latest HotKey recorded by razor as HotKeyEvent object.

paramList.itemDescription: True: Client coordinates.- False:Screen coordinates (default: True, client).

methods.itemDescription:
Perform a phisical left click on the window using Windows API.
Is possible to use abolute Screen Coordinates by setting clientCoords=False.

methods.returnDesc: True: Text found - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Search in open Old Menu if contains a specific text.
Perform a menu response by subitem name. If item not exist close menu.

methods.returnDesc: Return X,Y coords as Point object.
methods.itemDescription: Returns a point with the X and Y coordinates of the mouse relative to the UO Window
Moves the mouse pointer to the position X,Y relative to the UO window

Return the X,Y of the next container, relative to the game window.
(OSI client only, no ClassicUO)
Just do nothing and enjot the present moment.

methods.returnDesc: True: Open is active - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Get the status of "No Run When Stealth" via scripting.
Set "No Run When Stealth" via scripting. Changes via scripting are not persistents.

Open the backpack. 
(OSI client only, no ClassicUO)
Pause the script for a given amount of time.
Rename a specific pet.

paramList.itemDescription: name to assign to the pet
The x point to send sound to.
The y point to send sound to.
The z point to send sound to.

methods.itemDescription: Send a sound to the client.
Perform a query string response by ok or cancel button and specific response string.

methods.returnDesc: Path as text
methods.itemDescription:
Get the full path to the main Razor Enhanced folder.
This path maybe be different from the Python starting folder when RE is loaded as plugin (ex: ClassicUO)

methods.returnDesc: The stored object.
methods.itemDescription:
Get a Shared Value, if value not exist return null.
Shared values are accessible by every script.

Allows removal of a line in a file within RE ValidLocations.
For OSI/RE this is only the RE directory / sub-directories
For CUO/RE this is only CUO or RE directory / sub-directories
The filename MUST end in a limited file suffix list
Checks to see if an identical line is in the file, and if it exists, it is removed and file written
Remove a Shared Value.
Reset a prompt response.
Response a prompt request. Often used to rename runes and similar.
Trigger a client ReSync.

paramList.itemDescription: True: Client coordinates - False: Screen coordinates (default: True, client).

methods.itemDescription: Perform a phisical Right click on the window.

paramList.itemDescription: True:Returns the full path. False: Returns the filename. (Dafault: true)

methods.itemDescription: Returns the path of the current script.

methods.returnDesc: Full path to the Scripts Directory.
methods.itemDescription: Get the full path to the Scripts Directory.

methods.returnDesc: True: Script is suspended - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Get status of script if is suspended or not, Script must be present in script grid.
Resume a script by file name, Script must be present in script grid.
Run a script by file name, Script must be present in script grid.

methods.returnDesc: True: Script is running - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Get status of script if running or not, Script must be present in script grid.
Stop a script by file name, Script must be present in script grid.

paramList.itemDescription: True: Stop all scripts, but the current one - False: stop all scripts. (Dafault: false)

methods.itemDescription: Stop all script running.
Suspend a script by file name, Script must be present in script grid.

paramList.itemDescription: True: Wait for confimation. - False: Returns instatnly.

methods.itemDescription: Send a message to the client.

Send to the client a list of keystrokes. Can contain control characters: 
- Send Control+Key: ctrl+u: ^u
- Send ENTER: {Enter}
Note: some keys don't work with ClassicUO (es: {Enter} )

Set a Shared Value by specific name, if value exist he repalce value.
Shared values are accessible by every script.

methods.returnDesc: Name of the shard
methods.itemDescription: Get the name of the shard.
Remove object from ignore list. Can remove serial, items or mobiles

methods.returnDesc: True: Optiona selected succesfully - False: otherwise.

paramList.itemDescription: Serial of the Item or Mobile.
Maximum wait for the action to complete.

methods.itemDescription: Open and click the option of Context menu, given the serial of Mobile or Item, via packets.

methods.returnDesc: A List of Context objects.
methods.itemDescription:
Return the List entry of a Context menu, of Mobile or Item objects.
The function will ask the server for the List and wait for a maximum amount of time.

paramList.itemDescription: max time to wait for context
max time to wait for context

methods.returnDesc: True: if the Old Menu is open - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Pause script until server send an Old Menu, for a maximum amount of time.

methods.returnDesc: True: Prompt is present - False: otherwise
methods.itemDescription: Wait for a prompt for a maximum amount of time.

methods.returnDesc: True: if player has a query - False: otherwise.
methods.itemDescription: Pause script until server send query string request, for a maximum amount of time.
